string.text: PSO-1M Scope

A PSO-1M scope designed for precision shooting. This optic offers a magnification of 4.0x, allowing for accurate target acquisition at medium to long ranges. The scope features a rangefinder reticle and an illuminated red chevron, enhancing visibility in low-light conditions. Constructed from durable aluminum alloy, it is both lightweight and rugged. Manufactured by NPZ Optics State Plant in Russia. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] firearm attachment
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnified Optic (4x)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] origin: Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] manufacturer: NPZ Optics State Plant
1P29 Tulip Scope

A 1P29 Tulip scope designed for the AK family of rifles. This optic provides a 4.0x magnification, allowing for improved target identification and engagement at range. It features a unique bullet drop compensator and a wide field of view, enhancing accuracy and situational awareness. Made from rugged materials, it withstands harsh conditions. Originally manufactured in the Soviet Union. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] manufacturer: Soviet Union
Barska Electro Sight

A Barska Electro Sight designed for rapid target acquisition. This red dot optic offers a 1.0x magnification, providing an unlimited field of view and parallax-free aiming. The illuminated reticle can be adjusted for brightness, enhancing visibility in various lighting conditions. Constructed from high-quality aluminum, it is lightweight and durable. Manufactured by Barska in the United States. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] manufacturer: Barska
ACOG 4.0x Scope

An ACOG scope with 4.0x magnification, designed for tactical shooting. This optic provides clear, fixed magnification with an illuminated reticle that enhances target acquisition in low-light environments. The rugged design ensures durability under combat conditions. Made from aircraft-grade aluminum, it is both lightweight and strong. Manufactured by Trijicon in the United States.

EOTech 553 Sight

An EOTech 553 holographic sight, designed for quick target acquisition. It offers a 1.0x magnification with a large field of view, allowing for rapid aiming and tracking. The sight features multiple brightness settings for the reticle, suitable for various lighting conditions. Constructed from durable materials, it is both shockproof and waterproof. Manufactured by EOTech in the United States.

Kobra EKP 1S-03 Sight

A Kobra EKP 1S-03 red dot sight designed for rapid target acquisition. This optic offers a 1.0x magnification with an adjustable reticle brightness for various lighting conditions. It features a lightweight and durable construction with a quick-detach mount for easy installation. Manufactured by Axion in Russia.

PSO-1M2-1 Scope

A PSO-1M2-1 scope designed for precision marksmen. This optic provides a 4.0x magnification, ideal for long-range engagements. The illuminated reticle features a rangefinder for accurate distance estimation. Constructed from high-strength aluminum, it is both lightweight and durable. Manufactured by NPZ Optics State Plant in Russia.

A C-MORE tactical sight designed for rapid target acquisition. This red dot optic provides a clear, parallax-free reticle with adjustable brightness settings. Constructed from high-quality materials, it is lightweight and durable, suitable for various tactical applications. Manufactured by C-More Systems in the United States.

5.7x28 Suppressor

A 5.7x28 suppressor designed for reducing muzzle flash and sound. Constructed from high-grade materials, it provides durability and effective sound suppression. The compact design allows for easy attachment and maneuverability. Manufactured in Belgium, this suppressor is ideal for tactical applications.

9mm Suppressor

A versatile 9mm suppress
or designed to reduce muzzle flash and sound signature. Constructed from high-grade aluminum and steel, it offers durability and effective noise reduction. The suppressor is compatible with various 9mm firearms. Manufactured in multiple countries.

An ATG suppressor designed for versatility, compatible with both 5.56mm and 7.62mm firearms. Made from high-grade steel, it offers effective sound suppression and durability. The suppressor is easy to attach and detach, making it suitable for various tactical scenarios. Manufactured in Russia.

KAC QDSS NT-4 5.56x45 Suppressor

A KAC QDSS NT-4 suppressor designed to reduce muzzle flash and sound signature for 5.56x45mm firearms. Made from durable materials, it ensures effective sound suppression and long-lasting performance. Manufactured by Knight's Armament Company in the United States.
